definition: exterior surface/family relationship via females/to show (one's opinion)/a model/a table (listing information)/a form/a meter (measuring sth)

sentences.english: The who was mute with shock was Safiyah, the other one was her cousin.
sentences.chinese: 害怕的說不出話的是索菲婭，另一個是她的表姐妹。

sentences.english: I asked her to teach her two cousins to learn English.
sentences.chinese: 我讓她去教兩個表姐妹學英語。

sentences.english: I hope that my cousins are all well.
sentences.chinese: 我希望我的表姐妹們都好。

sentences.english: Then she went to play with her cousins.
sentences.chinese: 於是，她就跟表姐妹一塊出去玩了。

sentences.english: I don't want to have a fight with my cousin, because she's my best friend.
sentences.chinese: 我不想和我的表姐妹發生爭吵，因爲她是最好的朋友。

sentences.english: There are much likeness between the two cousins.
sentences.chinese: 這兩個表姐妹非常相像。

definition: wife of younger male cousin via female line/younger cousins via female line
wife of mother's brother/aunt/maternal uncle's wife
wife of younger male cousin via male line/younger cousins via male line
father's female cousin via female line
wife of older male cousin via male line
